meanings.definition: A person who visits a place.
meanings.sent1: The visiter enjoyed exploring the museum.
meanings.sent2: The visiter went to the zoo to see the animals.
meanings.sent3: The friendly visiter brought a gift for the host.
meanings.sent4: The curious visiter was like a sponge, absorbing all the new information.
meanings.sent5: The young visiter's eyes widened in amazement at the sight of the waterfall.

meanings.definition: To go to see or spend time with (someone) socially.
meanings.sent1: Let's visiter our neighbors this weekend.
meanings.sent2: I plan to visiter my friend at the park tomorrow.
meanings.sent3: We should visiter Aunt Mary for tea and cookies.
meanings.sent4: The idea to visiter the new cafe popped into my head.
meanings.sent5: She loves to visiter her grandparents and hear their stories.
